columns.Festival_ID: A unique identifier for each festival entry.
columns.Chair_Name: The name of the person serving as the chair for the festival.
columns.Location: The geographical location where the festival is held.
columns.Year: The year in which the festival took place.
columns.Num_of_Audience: The total number of audience members that attended the festival.

festival_detail.table_description: The festival_detail table contains details about various festivals, including their identifiers, names, chairs, locations, years of occurrence, and audience sizes.

columns.Artwork_ID: A unique identifier for each artwork entry in the table.
columns.Type: The classification of the artwork, indicating the format or genre it belongs to.
columns.Name: The title or name of the artwork.

artwork.table_description: The artwork table stores information about various pieces of artwork recognized in entertainment awards, including their unique identifiers, types, and names.

columns.Artwork_ID: Unique identifier for each artwork that is nominated for an award.
columns.Festival_ID: Identifier for the festival where the artwork is nominated.
columns.Result: Indicates the status of the nomination, such as whether the artwork was nominated or won an award.

nomination.table_description: The nomination table records the nominations of various artworks in different festivals, along with their resulting status.
